item.title: Interesting Github Repositories
item.description: Interesting Github repositories funsish Picture combinators and recursive fish. TempleOS TempleOS. napkin The Napkin project is a personal exposition project of mine aimed at making higher math accessible to high school students. The philosophy is stated in the preamble: I’ll be eating a quick lunch with some friends of mine who are still in high school. They’ll ask me what I’ve been up to the last few weeks, and I’ll tell them that I’ve been learning category theory.
